sect1.title: FlyMine status
sect1.para: The FlyMine database is currently in the late stages of Beta release. We believe that it contains an accurate representation of the source databases, but for some source we are still working to complete the integration and add value.

sect2.title: Current Data Sources
sect2.para: FlyMine has the following datasource available:

itemizedlist.listitem: Genome Annotation for D. melanogaster and A. gambiae from Ensembl (http://www.ensembl.org)
Orthologues between D. melanogaster and A. gambiae from Ensembl (http://www.ensembl.org)
Orthologues and Paralogues between D. melanogaster and C. elegans from inParanoid (http://inparanoid.cgb.ki.se/index.html)
2-hybrid protein-protein interactions for D. melanogaster: Curagen set (Giot et al (2003) Science 302 1727-1736) and Hybrigenics set (http://pim.hybrigenics.com/pimrider/nologin/prhome.html)
2-hybrid protein-protein interactions for C. elegans: (Li et al (2004) Science 303 540-543)
RNAi phenotypes for C. elegans from WormBase (http://www.wormbase.org)
